subtitleNullable: Dataset about top rated and some Indian(perfect for building recommender system)
descriptionNullable:
**About**
This dataset contains data about the top rated movies of all time. Data was sourced from TMDB APIs.

**Columns**
adult: type of move
backdrop_path: photo path of backdrop, you can access with https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/{backdrop_path}
movie_id : id of movie on tmdb
original_language: original language of movie
original_title: native title of movie
overview : movie plot description
popularity: 
poster_path
release_date:
title : name of the movie
video:
vote_average:
vote_count:
genres : genres of movie
keywords : a short phrase attached to a title (e.g. movie / series / episode) that describes it in some way
cast : all the casts worked in movie
crew : details of all crew who involved in movie


**Inspiration**
This dataset was curated with a passion for exploring the rich history of cinema and storytelling, and with a deep desire to create unique and powerful insights into the world of movies. By performing an extensive exploratory data analysis on this data, I aim to uncover hidden patterns and trends in movie data that have never been seen before, and to use these insights to build cutting-edge recommender systems that can help movie lovers discover new and exciting films they might otherwise never have known about. Whether you're a die-hard movie buff or just someone who loves a good story, this dataset has something for everyone, and I'm excited to share it with the world!

This dataset was curated with a passion for exploring the rich history of cinema and storytelling, and with a deep desire to create unique and powerful insights into the world of movies. By performing an extensive exploratory data analysis on this data, I aim to uncover hidden patterns and trends in movie data that have never been seen before, and to use these insights to build cutting-edge recommender systems that can help movie lovers discover new and exciting films they might otherwise never have known about. Whether you're a die-hard movie buff or just someone who loves a good story, this dataset has something for everyone, and I'm excited to share it with the world!
